description: This file defines the 'BatteryPowered' interface, which specifies methods related to battery state and voltage management for devices.

classes.name: BatteryPowered
classes.description: An interface that declares methods for managing battery status and voltage for a device.

methods.name: setLowBattery
methods.description: Sets the device into a low battery state based on the boolean parameter.

methods.name: isLowBattery
methods.description: Returns the current low battery status as a boolean.

methods.name: setBatteryVoltage
methods.description: Sets the device's battery voltage with the provided short value.
